languages.text: {n}Взгляд Караэля задерживается на вас, а точнее — на клейме на вашей шее. Внезапно он хмыкает.{/n} "Ты заскучал вдали от дома, Маражай? Нашел себе безделушку?"
{n}Kharael's gaze lingers on you, or more specifically, on the brand on your neck. Suddenly he snorts.{/n} "Did you get bored away from home, Marazhai? You found yourself a toy?"
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Караэля задерживается на вас, а точнее — на клейме на вашей шее. Внезапно он хмыкает.{/n} "Ты заскучал вдали от дома, Маражай? Нашел себе безделушку?"

traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael's gaze lingers on you, or more specifically, on the brand on your neck. Suddenly he snorts.{/n} "Did you get bored away from home, Marazhai? You found yourself a toy?"
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharaels Blick bleibt an dir hängen, oder besser gesagt an dem Brandmal an deinem Hals. Plötzlich schnaubt er auf.{/n} "War Euch langweilig so fern von zu Hause, Marazhai? Habt Ihr Euch ein Spielzeug gesucht?"
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's gaze lingers on you, or more specifically, on the brand on your neck. Suddenly he snorts.{/n} "Did you get bored away from home, Marazhai? You found yourself a toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharaels Blick bleibt an dir hängen, oder besser gesagt an dem Brandmal an deinem Hals. Plötzlich schnaubt er auf.{/n} "War Euch langweilig so fern von zu Hause, Marazhai? Habt Ihr Euch ein Spielzeug gesucht?"
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔的目光停留在你身上，或者更确切地说，停留在你脖子的烙印上。他突然哼了一声。{/n}“离开家是不是让你感觉无聊了，玛拉斋？所以你给自己找了个玩具？”
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's gaze lingers on you, or more specifically, on the brand on your neck. Suddenly he snorts.{/n} "Did you get bored away from home, Marazhai? You found yourself a toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔的目光停留在你身上，或者更确切地说，停留在你脖子的烙印上。他突然哼了一声。{/n}“离开家是不是让你感觉无聊了，玛拉斋？所以你给自己找了个玩具？”
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Kharael s'attarde sur vous, ou plus précisément, sur la marque dans votre cou. Soudain, il émet un petit rire.{/n} « Vous vous ennuyez, loin du bercail, Marazhai ? Vous vous êtes trouvé un esclave ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's gaze lingers on you, or more specifically, on the brand on your neck. Suddenly he snorts.{/n} "Did you get bored away from home, Marazhai? You found yourself a toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Kharael s'attarde sur vous, ou plus précisément, sur la marque dans votre cou. Soudain, il émet un petit rire.{/n} « Vous vous ennuyez, loin du bercail, Marazhai ? Vous vous êtes trouvé un esclave ? "
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael posa su mirada sobre ti. Concretamente, sobre la marca de tu cuello. De pronto, resopla.{/n} «¿Tanto te aburrías lejos de casa, Marazhai? ¿Ya has encontrado otro juguete?».
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's gaze lingers on you, or more specifically, on the brand on your neck. Suddenly he snorts.{/n} "Did you get bored away from home, Marazhai? You found yourself a toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael posa su mirada sobre ti. Concretamente, sobre la marca de tu cuello. De pronto, resopla.{/n} «¿Tanto te aburrías lejos de casa, Marazhai? ¿Ya has encontrado otro juguete?».
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}カラエルの視線はずっとあなたに―正確には首にある烙印に向いている。不意に彼はふんと鼻を鳴らした。{/n}「故郷から遠く離れて退屈になったのか、マラズハイ？自分自身をおもちゃとでも思ったのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's gaze lingers on you, or more specifically, on the brand on your neck. Suddenly he snorts.{/n} "Did you get bored away from home, Marazhai? You found yourself a toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カラエルの視線はずっとあなたに―正確には首にある烙印に向いている。不意に彼はふんと鼻を鳴らした。{/n}「故郷から遠く離れて退屈になったのか、マラズハイ？自分自身をおもちゃとでも思ったのか？」
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael'in bakışları sana, daha doğrusu boynundaki damgaya kayıyor. Aniden bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Evinden uzakta çok mu canın sıkıldı Marazhai? Kendine yeni bir oyuncak mı buldun?"
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's gaze lingers on you, or more specifically, on the brand on your neck. Suddenly he snorts.{/n} "Did you get bored away from home, Marazhai? You found yourself a toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael'in bakışları sana, daha doğrusu boynundaki işarete kayıyor. Aniden bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Evinden uzakta canın çok mu sıkıldı Marazhai? Kendine yeni bir oyuncak mı buldun?"
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari
